header.title: Ngā Whakamātautau Mahara
header.subtitle: Whakapai i ō pūkenga whakatere tohu whenua

quickTips.title: Ngā Tohutohu Mahara Tere
tips: Titiro ki muri ki tō waka i mua i te tomo ki te whare - ka kaha ake te mahara whakaahua.
Whakamahia tō waea ki te tango whakaahua hei taupuni, engari ngana ki te whakawhirinaki ki te mahara tuatahi.
Whakamātauhia ēnei tikanga i ngā wāhi e mōhiotia ana kia whai maia i mua i te whakamahi i ngā wāhi hou.

landmarkChain.title: Tikanga Mekameka Tohu Whenua
landmarkChain.description: Waihanga hononga maharatanga i waenga i ngā tohu whenua hei hanga ara hinengaro ki tō waka.
steps: I te wā e wehe ana i tō waka, tautuhia 3-5 tohu whenua rereke i tō ara
Waihangahia tētahi kōrero e hono ana i ia tohu whenua
Hei tauira: "I pāka au i te pouaka mēra WHERO, haere atu i te rākau TEITEI, tomo mai i te tatau KIKORANGI"
Whakamāramatia te kōrero 2-3 wā i a koe e haere ana
I te hokinga mai, hurihia te kōrero kia kitea tō ara
tips: Whakamahia ngā taipitopito autaia, rereke e tū mai ana
Whakauru i ngā tae, te rahi, me ngā āhuatanga ahurei
Ko te mea noa iho te kōrero, ko te ngāwari ake te mahara

photoMemory.title: Whare Mahara Whakaahua
photoMemory.description: Whakamahia ngā hopunga ataata kia hangaia he mahere hinengaro o tō wāhi pāka.
steps: Tū mai ki tō waka, tangohia tētahi "whakaahua" hinengaro o te rohe
Hurihia 90 kenenga, tangohia anō tētahi hopunga hinengaro
Whakaarohia kia 4 ngā whakaahua hinengaro (kotahi mō ia ahunga)
I a koe e haere atu ana, titiro ki muri, tangohia te whakaahua hinengaro whakamutunga
I te hokinga mai, whakamaumaharatia ēnei whakaahua i te huringa whakamuri
tips: Arotahia ngā āhuatanga tūturu, kaua ngā waka kē
Whakauru i ngā koki whare, tohu, me ngā tohu kua peita
Katia ō kanohi iti noa hei "tiaki" i ia whakaahua hinengaro

numberShape.title: Pūnaha Tau-Āhua
numberShape.description: Whakawhitihia ngā kōrero pāka ki ngā āhua me ngā tauira maharatanga.
steps: Tuhia tō nama wāhi pāka, ngā tohu tata rānei
Whakawhitihia ngā tau ki ngā āhua (1=pene, 2=wani, 3=manawa, etc.)
Waihangahia tētahi tirohanga me ēnei āhua
Tāpirihia te papa/taumata hei tae ki tō tirohanga
Arotakehia te whakaahua katoa i mua i te haere
tips: Whakamahia ngā hononga tau-āhua ōrite
Meinga te whakaahua hinengaro kia nui, kia kanapa
Tāpirihia te neke, te taunekeneke rānei i waenga i ngā āhua

breadcrumb.title: Tikanga Pirere Parāoa
breadcrumb.description: Waiho "pirere parāoa" hinengaro i ngā wāhanga whakatau matua o tō ara.
steps: I ia huringa, tomokanga rānei, tatari 2 hēkona
Tuhia tētahi āhuatanga ahurei o tērā wāhi
Kīia tēnā: "Ka huri mauī i te pou kōwhai"
Tauria ō huringa i a koe e haere ana
I te hokinga mai, tauria whakamuri, rapua ō tohu
tips: Arotahia ngā mea e kore e neke
Whakamahia ngā pūkaha maha - tuhia ngā oro me ngā kakara anō hoki
Whakamātauhia tēnei tikanga i ngā wāhi e mōhio ana koe tuatahi

spatialGrid.title: Whakamātautau Tukutuku Mokowā
spatialGrid.description: Whakawhanakehia ō pūkenga mahere hinengaro mā tēnei whakamātautau whakaahua.
steps: I mua i te pāka, whakaahuahia te rohe hei tukutuku mai i runga
Whakanohoia tō waka ki runga i tēnei tukutuku hinengaro
Tautuhia tō wāhi taunga i runga i te tukutuku
Tuhia tō ara i runga i te tukutuku hinengaro i a koe e haere ana
Whakamātauhia te hanga anō i te tukutuku mai i te mahara i tō taunga
Whakamahia te tukutuku hei whakatere hoki me te kore titiro ki ngā tohu whenua
tips: Tīmatahia ki ngā wāhi pāka tapawhā ngāwari
Whakamahia ngā ahunga matua (N, S, E, W) hei punga
Whakamātauhia i ngā wāhi e mōhio ana i mua i te ngana i ngā wāhi hou

association.title: Punga Hononga
association.description: Waihangahia ngā hononga hinengaro kaha i waenga i ngā tohu whenua me ngā mahara whaiaro.
steps: Tautuhia 3 tohu whenua tata ki tō wāhi pāka
Honohia ia tohu whenua ki tētahi mahara whaiaro, tangata rānei
Tauira: "Ko tēnei tohu whero e whakamaumahara ana i ahau ki te koti whero a māmā"
Waihangahia ngā hononga kare-ā-roto hei whakapakari i te mahara
Arotakehia ngā hononga i mua i te wehe atu i te rohe
tips: Whakamahia ngā mahara pai, whai tikanga
Ko te kaha o te kare-ā-roto, ko te pai ake o te mahara
Honohia ki ngā tāngata e mōhio ana koe hei pupuri pai ake
